entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Amos
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:53 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -8.6°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: -8.6°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to flurries at times heavy near noon. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
